sn51.2:1.1: “Yesam kesanci, bhikkhave, cattaro iddhipada viraddha, viraddho tesam ariyo maggo samma dukkhakkhayagami.
sn51.2:1.2: Yesam kesanci, bhikkhave, cattaro iddhipada araddha, araddho tesam ariyo maggo samma dukkhakkhayagami.
sn51.2:1.4: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu chandasamadhippadhanasankharasamannagatam iddhipadam bhaveti,
sn51.2:1.8: Yesam kesanci, bhikkhave, ime cattaro iddhipada viraddha, viraddho tesam ariyo maggo samma dukkhakkhayagami.
sn51.2:1.9: Yesam kesanci, bhikkhave, ime cattaro iddhipada araddha, araddho tesam ariyo maggo samma dukkhakkhayagami”ti.
